6.Pros: Never a dull moment. Always something to resolve or fix. Opportunity to help others grow. Opportunity for self growth. Fun when working with a motivated team.
6.Cons: Management training doesn't direct apply to real world. Generally poor customer base. High turnover rate due to low wages and lack of benefits. Long hours. Mandatory overtime. Physically and mentally exhausting on busy days. Relatively low pay when juxtaposed with the myriad responsibilities.
